website_summaries.verdict: Allergen and gluten-free supplement with high-quality ingredients.
pros: Made from chickpea flour sourced in India
Minimal reports of negative side effects
Comes with a transparency code that reveals information about all ingredients
Designed to aid in proper calcium absorption
cons: Large capsules are hard for some to swallow

customer_reviews.title: Great for Helping With Calcium Absorption
customer_reviews.text: Since I started taking K2, my bone density numbers have been improving. Until I did my own research, I did not know that my body needed the help of K2 for calcium to absorb. I was skeptical, but thought it was worth a try. Since I started taking K2, my bone density numbers have been steadily improving. This is the only change I made. I know that one example is not scientific evidence, but I can offer my own testimony that this product is working for me.
customer_reviews.author: Maria F. Roca

customer_reviews.title: Seems to Work
customer_reviews.text: There isn't a lot you can say about vitamins, but I started taking these at my doctor's request and they seem to be doing the job. The pills are easy to take and you only need to take one, which is good. I do wish they were a little bit smaller, but they aren't bad (at least for me). They seem to work well to help calcium get targeted toward bones where it is needed, so they are a good supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Goebel Padgett

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Amazon elements is a very high quality product at a reasonable cost. I definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Dominik

customer_reviews.title: Probably won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: I should have looked at all of the images, there is one showing one of the capsules compared to a nickel (5c) coin. Quite large capsules full of what looks like powdered wood. The ones I have been buying (and taking) are much smaller liquid filled gel capsules. For the price difference (1c more for five less) I will be going back to my previous brand. Made in India does not instill confidence. "Vegan" label doesn't help much either - I am interested in the supplement, not people's random belief systems. I will use them, not return them, but this makes me inclined to avoid this brand in future.
customer_reviews.author: PJP

customer_reviews.title: They don't say how long it takes to get into your system
customer_reviews.text: I wish they specified how long it takes to get into one's system. Also, I like the pills better than the capsules.
customer_reviews.author: Peg H.

customer_reviews.title: A natural remedy instead of too many RX
customer_reviews.text: My son is using the product, and he does not yet know if it is producing the desired results, but my research indicates that this product is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take,and not expensive.
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to take with water and inexpensive. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John Hennessy Jr.

customer_reviews.title: At this early time after purchase I honestly have no ...
customer_reviews.text: At this early time after purchase I honestly have no idea if they are doing anything or not? No side affects negative though.
customer_reviews.author: Catlover

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. It is hard to find more than ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It is hard to find more than 30 pills in a bottle, so I was pleased to find this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The price is good. However
customer_reviews.text: The price is good. However, the capsules are much larger than the comparable product I was using before. This makes them harder to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Digita

customer_reviews.title: The transparency code is really cool. Normally i'm skeptical about vitamins
customer_reviews.text: The transparency code is really cool. Normally i'm skeptical about vitamins, but scanning this code showed me the potency and purity of the product. Really cool!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins are very high quality! I would definitely order more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Changed from a different brand, have just started taking these this week so will see if I can tell a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: I think these are a really great value. However having become a bit obsessive -compulsive about vitamin supplements I switched to a brand name "MeneQ7" vitamin K for a more money and which I can not tell you is doing me any more good.
customer_reviews.author: R. Freese

customer_reviews.title: Premium Quality
customer_reviews.text: This K2 vitamins are premium quality supplements that have become part of my daily regimen. For me, quality is of the upmost importance and this product provides me with that satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: firsttimebuyer

customer_reviews.title: Benefits for Heart, bones & total wellness.
customer_reviews.text: Fat soluble Vitamins are Transformative! A D E K Will definitely reorder, good choice! Feeling much BETTER!
customer_reviews.author: KAS

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: The right molecule to be absorbed into the body. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Richardj

customer_reviews.title: Taste weird.
customer_reviews.text: I really didn’t like them as one container calcium and two have wired taste.
customer_reviews.author: Judson Somerville MD review rank

customer_reviews.title: hoping it will help with osteoporosis
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised. Easy to swallow. Will have to wait to see if it helps my condition.
customer_reviews.author: savarato

customer_reviews.title: Lets keep the calcium in our bones.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this version of K2 and it seems to work as well as the more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don’t really know till the next doctors exam. Was prescribed for bone health.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent customer

customer_reviews.title: & his skin bruises easily. his drs
customer_reviews.text: i really can't say. i ordered these for my husband that is taking heart meds. & his skin bruises easily. his drs. told him not to take this. i have to make the stars so i could share this.
customer_reviews.author: sonie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I give it three stars because I have no way of knowing if it's working.
customer_reviews.author: Gary H

customer_reviews.title: No real benefits for me
customer_reviews.text: I saw no health benefits from this product. I am saddened that I wasted my money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!! Contains wood cellulose!
customer_reviews.text: The very first ingredient is "Microcrystalized Cellulose," which is WOOD PULP. This substance gets into your cells and does not come out. Don't take my word, just do your research!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: India made K2 careful
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I totally trust ingredients from India or China. The k2 in this product is from India.
customer_reviews.author: Supplement Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant!!
customer_reviews.text: IDK if this had anything to do with it but I've been trying for OVER 7 years and I switch my vitD3 to this one and boom😱!
customer_reviews.author: andrea seawell

customer_reviews.title: Good For Bone Health
customer_reviews.text: I think any woman over 45 should be taking a K-2 supplement to increase bone health and to reduce the chance of osteoporosis. Whether we like it or not we have an increased chance of osteoporosis after menopause. But, there are so many options for supplement it can be overwhelming. I like that Amazon is completely transparent. I feel more secure about what you're putting into my body. Not to mention their brand is cheaper than a lot that are on the counters in local stores. These are easy to swallow capsules. No - allergens, artificial colors and flavors, chemical preservatives, gluten, or soy.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda G.

customer_reviews.title: A solid choice
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to tell the difference between supplements, unless something clearly doesn't work. This was a fine replacement for my Now brand K2 (which I take to support Vitamin D, during non-sunny seasons in Chicago). I like that Amazon is branding their own products and am happy to help them, in their quest to take over the world.
customer_reviews.author: Got Influence?

customer_reviews.title: The product is being used to reduce the calcium that's ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is being used to reduce the calcium that's in my blood instead of my bones. No results yet but, alot of hope!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Gall bladder/liver pain
customer_reviews.text: It was on amazon deal page. I could have bought this at Trader Joe's brand for less than 8 bucks. But, the shiny packaging bought me. Ever since I started this supplement, I'm having dull pain on my upper left right above my abdomen.Not taking it anymore. Not sure what all those reviews are for.
customer_reviews.author: Navin L

customer_reviews.title: This is a good way to loose customers
customer_reviews.text: This product contains Magnesium Stearate. Magnesium Stearate blocks absorption and has other controversial health risks.
customer_reviews.author: Pay Attention

customer_reviews.title: chickpeas are same family as soy for allergy info
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of allergies. I do but Dr. Mercola's lipsomal Vit d3, and have no problem. I want to point out that this is made with chickpeas. If you are allergic to soy, you are likely to be allergic to chickpeas. They are in the same food family.
customer_reviews.author: FightForWhatsRight

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money! Gives me gas and bad after taste
customer_reviews.text: Gives me gas and a bad after taste that i cant wash down
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Vitamin K
customer_reviews.text: Amazon Elements Vitamin K2 is great. An all Vegan product, so great for the vegan minded and those along that path. This Vitamin K is a great start, because for one, it's from a fermented source and for the other because of it being made by Amazon. Fermented products are always or should always be the preferred way to go. With Amazon being one of the champions of this type of product (fermented food sources), we all should reap the benefits. Also, Vitamin K is good for our bones and arteries.
customer_reviews.author: Atomic Tofu

customer_reviews.title: Is it K2 or turmeric?
customer_reviews.text: All this transparency on their ingredients seem to instill confidence in until I saw the claim Important information "Ingredients : Turmeric Root Extract"
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Urbane Affable

product_meta.title: Amazon Elements Vitamin K2 100 mcg, Vegan, 65 Capsules, 2 month supply (Packaging may vary)
product_meta.description:
Style:Vitamin K2The vitamin K2 in our once-daily supplement is 100% trans Menaquinone-7 made from chickpea flour that we source in India.

Every batch of Amazon Elements vitamins and supplements is rigorously tested to ensure quality and safety. Amazon Elements thoroughly tests every batch of product for quality and safety--see below for detailed information about ingredient origins.
feature_bullets: Our vegan vitamin K2 is 100% trans Menaquinone-7 made from chickpea flour
65 capsules, a 2 month supply (taken daily at the listed serving size)
No artificial colors, flavors or chemical preservatives
Made in a Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) facility
Satisfaction Guarantee: We're proud of our products. If you aren't satisfied, we'll refund you for any reason within a year of purchase. 1-877-485-0385
If you like NOW Supplements Vitamin K2 100mcg, we invite you to try Amazon Elements Vitamin K2 100mcg capsules
